OrmLiteDefaultContentProvider
public abstract class OrmLiteBaseContentProvider<T extends com.j256.ormlite.android.apptools.OrmLiteSqliteOpenHelper>
extends android.content.ContentProvider

Base class to use for ContentProvider in Android. Like OrmLiteBaseActivity, this class is a thin wrapper.

Author:
Jaken
See Also:
OrmLiteBaseActivity
